Function.description: Array of strings spread and then passed to `new Function()`.

summary.description: Summary of the CSS property. Used in documentation.

initial.description: The specified initial value of the CSS property.

inherited.description: Whether the CSS property is inherited through the cascade.

stability.description: Stability level of the entire CSS property, and any values thereof unless explicitly overridden.

values.description: List of CSS values this CSS property supports.

generators.description: List of functions generating CSS values.

name.description: Name of the generator function to be called.

transforms.description: Defines functions that transform a pure data value into a CSS_Value type.

namefn.description: Determines how to compute the `name` JSON property of a CSS value.

codefn.description: Determines how to compute the `code` JSON property of a CSS value.

usefn.description: Determines how to compute the `use`  JSON property of a CSS value.

options.description: A set of possible auxiliary options when calling the generator function.

non_media.description: Lists exceptions to supported media at-rules.

pseudo.description: List of pseudo-classes this CSS property supports.

use.description: Overrides any generated CSS code for this value.

alt.description: Alternative CSS code, overridden by generated code and by 'use'.

stability.description: Stability level of the CSS value. Overrides that of the property it belongs to.
